title: Coal and the nineteenth century
brief_description: SUMMARY: Dr. Colin Russell considers the use of coal as a raw material. The six sections of the film deal with different products resulting from the decomposition of coal, looking at both the manufacturing processes and the social impact. Wherever possibl
